乖離: (かいり) - divergence; alienation; deviation; estrangement; separation; detachment
乗: (sim/não) - ride , (nth) power; counter for vehicles; multiplication; Buddha's teachings
乗じる: (じょうじる) - to take advantage of/to follow blindly; to multiply
乗す: (のす) - to place on (something); to take on board; to give a ride to
乗ずる: (じょうずる) - to take advantage of/to follow blindly; to multiply
乗せる: (のせる) - to place on (something); (esp. 乗せる) to give (someone) a ride/to give a lift/to pick up/to help on board; (esp. 載せる) to load (luggage)/to carry/to take on board; to send out (on the airwaves, etc.); to deceive/to take for a ride; to (sing) along with (musical accompaniment); to let (someone) take part; to excite (someone); (載せる only) to publish (an article)/to run (an ad)
乗せ込む: (のせこむ) - to load/to load up (onto, into); to upload
乗っかる: (のっかる) - to get on; to climb on
乗っとる: (のっとる) - to capture; to hijack; to commandeer; to occupy; to usurp
乗っ切る: (のっきる) - to overcome; to get through
乗っ取り: (のっとり) - capture; takeover; hijack; skyjacking
乗っ取る: (のっとる) - to conform to; to be in accordance with; to follow (rule, tradition, example, etc.)
乗り: (nori) - riding, ride; spread (of paints) , riding, ride; spread (of paints); -seater (por exemplo, dois lugares); (getting into the) mood, (entering into the) spirit, energy, enthusiasm, rhythm, feeling
乗りいい: (のりいい) - easy to ride; riding well
乗りうつる: (のりうつる) - to change (cars or horses); to transfer; to possess; to inspire
乗りかえ: (のりかえ) - transfer (trains, buses, etc.)/connection/connexion; {econ} switching (stock); chromosomal crossover/crossing over
乗りかえる: (のりかえる) - to transfer (trains)/to change (bus, train); to change one's mind/to move on to (e.g. a new love interest)/to change methods/to change one's way of thinking
乗りかえ案内: (のりかえあんない) - transfer information (e.g. changing trains); crossover information
乗りかかった船: (のりかかったふね) - already embarked (and hence cannot go back); already started
乗りかかる: (のりかかる) - to be about to board; to be riding on; to get on top of; to lean over; to set about; to collide with
乗りかける: (のりかける) - to be about to board; to be riding on; to get on top of; to lean over; to set about; to collide with
乗りがいい: (ノリがいい) - (exp,adj-ix)    spreading well; easily be influenced into joining some mood; easy to get into
乗りが悪い: (のりがわるい) - (ant: ノリが良い・ノリがよい・3) difficult to get into; (ant: ノリが良い・ノリがよい・2) not be easily influenced into joining some mood or activity
乗りこえる: (のりこえる) - to climb over/to get over/to ride across; to surmount/to overcome; to surpass/to overtake
乗りそこなう: (のりそこなう) - to miss (e.g. train, plane)
乗りそこねる: (のりそこねる) - to miss getting on (e.g. a plane)
乗りつける: (のりつける) - to ride up to/to drive up to; to get used to riding/to get used to driving
乗りはぐれる: (のりはぐれる) - to miss (train, boat)
乗りまわす: (のりまわす) - to drive (a car) around; to ride (a bicycle) around
乗り上げる: (のりあげる) - to run aground; to be stranded
乗り付ける: (のりつける) - to ride up to/to drive up to; to get used to riding/to get used to driving
乗り入る: (のりいる) - to ride into (a place); to drive into (a place)
乗り入れる: (のりいれる) - to ride into (a place); to drive into (a place); extend (a line into a city)
乗り出す: (のりいだす) - to set out/to set sail; to embark on (a new venture)/to set out (to achieve something); to begin to ride; to lean forward
乗り切る: (のりきる) - to weather (a storm, rough seas)/to ride across/to sail across; to get through (adversity)/to weather/to get over/to tide over/to overcome; to load completely (e.g. books on a shelf, people or luggage in a car)
乗り取る: (のりとる) - to capture; to occupy; to usurp
乗り口: (のりぐち) - entry (esp. to vehicles)/entrance; (のりくち only)  equipage for restraining and mounting horses
乗り合い: (のりあい) - riding together/fellow passenger; joint partnership
乗り合いタクシー: (のりあいタクシー) - share taxi
乗り合い船: (のりあいせん) - ferryboat/ferry/passenger boat; (esp. のりあいせん) shared fishing boat
乗り合わす: (のりあわす) - to happen to ride together; to share a vehicle
乗り合わせる: (のりあわせる) - to happen to ride together; to share a vehicle; to (operate a) carpool
乗り回す: (のりまわす) - to drive (a car) around; to ride (a bicycle) around
乗り心地: (のりごこち) - one's feeling while riding
乗り戻す: (のりもどす) - to ride (a horse) back; to drive (a car) back
乗り捨てる: (のりすてる) - to get off; to abandon (a ship or vehicle)
乗り捨て料金: (のりすてりょうきん) - one-way car rental fee
乗り掛かった船: (のりかかったふね) - already embarked (and hence cannot go back); already started
乗り掛かる: (のりかかる) - to be about to board; to be riding on; to get on top of; to lean over; to set about; to collide with
乗り掛ける: (のりかける) - to be about to board; to be riding on; to get on top of; to lean over; to set about; to collide with
乗り掛る: (のりかかる) - to be about to board; to be riding on; to get on top of; to lean over; to set about; to collide with
乗り換え: (norikae) - transfer (trens, ônibus, etc.), connection, connexion; switching (stock) , transfer (trains, buses, etc.), connection, connexion; switching (stock); chromosomal crossover, crossing over
乗り換える: (のりかえる) - to transfer (trains)/to change (bus, train); to change one's mind/to move on to (e.g. a new love interest)/to change methods/to change one's way of thinking
乗り換え案内: (のりかえあんない) - transfer information (e.g. changing trains); crossover information
乗り換え駅: (のりかええき) - transfer station; transfer point
乗り損なう: (のりそこなう) - to miss (e.g. train, plane)
乗り損ねる: (のりそこねる) - to miss getting on (e.g. a plane)
乗り替え: (のりかえ) - transfer (trains, buses, etc.)/connection/connexion; {econ} switching (stock); chromosomal crossover/crossing over
乗り替える: (のりかえる) - to transfer (trains)/to change (bus, train); to change one's mind/to move on to (e.g. a new love interest)/to change methods/to change one's way of thinking
乗り潰す: (のりつぶす) - to ride (a horse) to death
乗り移る: (のりうつる) - to change (cars or horses); to transfer; to possess; to inspire
乗り組む: (のりくむ) - to get on aboard; to join a ship
乗り継ぐ: (のりつぐ) - to connect (with a different flight); to make a (flight) connection; to change (planes, trains, etc.)
乗り続ける: (のりつづける) - to continue riding
乗り良い: (のりよい) - easy to ride; riding well
乗り越える: (のりこえる) - to climb over/to get over/to ride across; to surmount/to overcome; to surpass/to overtake
乗り越し料金: (のりこしりょうきん) - excess fare (for going too far)
乗り越し精算: (のりこしせいさん) - adjusting one's fare for riding past one's destination
乗り越す: (のりこす) - to ride past; to pass; to outdistance
乗り込む: (のりこむ) - to board/to embark on/to get into (a car)/to man (a ship)/to help (someone) into; to march into/to enter
乗り逃げ: (のりにげ) - stealing a ride; stolen ride
乗り通る: (のりとおる) - to ride through; to ride along
乗り進める: (のりすすめる) - to ride forth
乗り逸れる: (のりはぐれる) - to miss (train, boat)
乗り遅れる: (のりおくれる) - to miss (train, bus, etc.)
乗り過ごす: (のりすごす) - to ride past; to miss one's stop (train, bus, etc.)
